SEARCH
Package inventory

Class ReplenishManager

java.lang.Object
inventory.ReplenishManager
public class ReplenishManager extends Object
Manages replenish requests for inventory items, including loading requests, displaying the replenish list, and processing new, approved, or rejected requests.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReplenishManager

      public ReplenishManager()

  • Method Details

    • setFilePaths

      public static void setFilePaths()
      Updates the file paths for loading and saving replenish requests data by retrieving them from the SystemInitialisation class.

      This method centralizes the file path management, ensuring that the file paths are dynamically retrieved rather than hardcoded, improving maintainability and flexibility.

      File paths updated:

      • originalPath: Path to the original CSV file containing admin data.
      • updatedPath: Path to the updated CSV file for saving admin data.
      See Also:
      • SystemInitialisation.getFilePath(String)

    • loadReplenish

      public static void loadReplenish(boolean isFirstRun)
      Loads the replenish requests from a CSV file.

      If it is the first run, it loads from the original path and clears the updated file. If not, it loads from the updated path.

      Parameters:
      isFirstRun - true if the application is running for the first time; false otherwise.

    • getReplenishList

      public static List<ReplenishRequest> getReplenishList()
      Returns the list of all replenish requests.
      Returns:
      A list of replenish requests

    • displayReplenishList

      public static void displayReplenishList()
      Displays all replenish requests currently loaded in the system. If the list is empty, it notifies the user.

    • duplicateReplenish

      public static void duplicateReplenish()
      Duplicates the replenish list by writing it to the updated CSV file.

    • generateReplenish

      public static void generateReplenish(String itemName, int replenishQuantity)
      Generates and adds a new replenish request for an item. The request is then written to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item to replenish
      replenishQuantity - The quantity of the item to replenish

    • findReplenishRequest

      public static ReplenishRequest findReplenishRequest(String requestID)
      Finds and returns a replenish request by its request ID.
      Parameters:
      requestID - The ID of the request to find
      Returns:
      The ReplenishRequest object, or null if not found

    • manageReplenish

      public static void manageReplenish(String requestID, Scanner sc)
      Manages a replenish request by allowing an administrator to approve or reject it.
      Parameters:
      requestID - The ID of the request to manage
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.

    • approveReplenish

      public static void approveReplenish(ReplenishRequest request)
      Approves a replenish request and updates the inventory stock. The request's status is set to APPROVED and the approval date is set to the current date.
      Parameters:
      request - The ReplenishRequest to approve

    • rejectReplenish

      public static void rejectReplenish(ReplenishRequest request)
      Rejects a replenish request. The request's status is set to REJECTED and the list is updated in the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      request - The ReplenishRequest to reject
